official_title: Reducing Colorectal Cancer Health Disparities: An mHealth Intervention to Improve Screening Among African American Men
inclusion_criteria:
* African American/Black
* not compliant with current United States Preventive Services Taskforce colorectal cancer screening recommendations
* owns a mobile phone capable of text messaging and accessing webpages
* able to speak/understand English
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be MALE
Must have minimum age of 45 Years
Must have maximum age of 75 Years
